Once an order is picked up, we unfortunately do not have control of when it will be delivered. For any issues, feel free to send us a message and we’ll do our best to assist you.
returnsRules: As Shopee does not offer exchange, Items may be returned and refunded within the allotted guarantee period. Send us a message for any concerns.
Please send us a photo of the item so we may assess the reason for the return/refund request
description.sizing: Please refer to our size chart. Measurements represented are from the product’s heel to toe. For a wider fit, we recommend going one size up.
